entries.title: Senior Perl Developer? Pick up machine learning with a move to Amsterdam
entries.text: Join a team of 10 machine learning and natural language geeks working on a modern and well-tested Perl codebase in Amsterdam (near Nieuwendam). You’re an experienced Perl developer, perhaps with some exposure to Perl internals (and XS), but also with the ability to guide a team of scientists in Perl best practices.

entries.title: Junior Perl developer for a charity and giving-focussed team in Kent, UK
entries.text: Want to do something good for once? Join the Kickstarter of the charity world, supporting activists and causes around the world. Based in Sevenoaks in Kent, you’ll be working in Perl to support a range of their charity and giving-focussed projects.

entries.title: Live in sunny Oxford, squeaky clean Modern Perl codebase
entries.text: Friendly and Perl-committed company based in Oxford who build a very popular software product. They use Catalyst + Starman, DBIx::Class, and are heavily bought in to Moose. Despite having been running for many years, almost none of the code is older than 3 years after a successful ground-up rewrite.
